Subtitle: THIS JOB IS EATING ME ALIVE.
I CAN'T BREATHE ANYMORE.
I SPENT ALL THESE YEARS TRYING TO BE THE GOOD GUY,
Human Translation:
좋은 사람이 되기 위해
평생 노력했지

Subtitle: THE MAN IN THE WHITE HAT.
I'M NOT BECOMING LIKE THEM.
I AM THEM.
HEY! WHAT ARE YOU DOING, WEIRDO?
I'M DOING THE BEST SPEECH FROM DONNIE BRASCO.
OR ACTUALLY, TEN OF ME ARE DOING THE BEST SPEECH FROM DONNIE BRASCO.
WHAT'S UP?
GET IT TOGETHER, MAN. OKAY?
SO THE STORE WAS HIT ABOUT TWO HOURS AGO.
THEY TOOK MOSTLY TABLETS, LAPTOPS, AND CAMERAS.
[music stops] SORRY.
I'D LIKE A LIST OF ALL YOUR EMPLOYEES, WHOEVER HAD ACCESS TO THE STORE.
Human Translation:
출입 가능한
모든 직원 명단이 필요해요

Subtitle: I'D ALSO LIKE TO APOLOGIZE FOR MY PARTNER.
HIS PARENTS DIDN'T GIVE HIM ENOUGH ATTENTION.
UH, DETECTIVE... I ALREADY SOLVED THE CASE.
WE'RE LOOKING FOR THREE WHITE MALES, ONE OF WHOM HAS SLEEVE TATS ON BOTH ARMS.
Human Translation:
백인 남자 셋에, 하나는
양팔에 문신 토시를 끼었네

Subtitle: AND HOW DO YOU KNOW THAT?
I HAD AN INFORMANT ON THE INSIDE.
HE'S BEEN HERE FOR YEARS.
WATCHING, LEARNING. WAITING.
HIS CODE NAME?
FUZZY CUDDLE BEAR.
HE'S A NANNY CAM.
[scoffs] YOU GOT LUCKY.
NO, I GOT HERE FIVE MINUTES BEFORE YOU
AND FIGURED THAT IN THIS GIGANTIC ELECTRONICS STORE, THERE HAD TO BE AT LEAST ONE WORKING CAMERA.
Human Translation:
분명히 돌고 있는
카메라가 있을 거 같았거든

Subtitle: OH! HI, BAD GUYS!
YOU DID IT, FUZZY. YOU BUSTED 'EM.
IT'S TIME TO COME HOME.
[as Fuzzy] I'M NOT SURE IF I CAN.
I'VE BEEN UNDERCOVER SO LONG, I'VE FORGOTTEN WHO I AM.
Human Translation:
잠복을 너무 오래 했더니
내가 누군지 까먹었어요

Subtitle: I HAVE SEEN TERRIBLE THINGS.
I HAVEN'T KNOWN THE TOUCH OF A WOMAN IN MANY MOONS.
Human Translation:
여자 손길도

Subtitle: ALL RIGHT.
DETECTIVE SANTIAGO!

Subtitle: SO, SANTIAGO, WOULD YOU DO THE HONORS?

I HATE THIS. AND YOU'RE JUST GONNA ADD ONE.
I'M WINNING.
IT'S A GOOD FEELING. IT'S A GOOD FEELING. YEAH.
ENJOY IT WHILE IT LASTS. I WILL!

Subtitle: JP, UPDATE ON THE MORGENTHAU MURDER?

CAGNEY AND LACEY.
THEY HAVE ADORABLE CHUBBY CHEEKS.
EVER SINCE, I KINDA GOT SCARED OF GETTING HURT.
LOST MY EDGE.
THERE WAS AN INCIDENT IN A DEPARTMENT STORE.

I'M FINE. I'M FINE.
